description:
A kids hat with no compromises. Based off the best-selling LTM6 Airflo broad brim, the Mini airflo has the protection and breathability to keep their heads cool all summer long.

  • Durable cotton has UPF 50+ sun protection with a DWR finish, keeping their head protected in rain or shine
  • Airflo technology offers improved breathability during those long play sessions
  • Foam brim keeps the hat afloat if they play frisbee by the lake
  • Velcro chin strap keeps hat secure in gusty conditions
  • Hidden pocket for those mid-hike tasty treats
name: Tilley Mini Airflo Explorer - Children
